mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M JOIN ROLE R ON M.MEMAIL = R.MEMAIL
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RN FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBER M JOIN ROLE R ON M.MEMAIL = R.MEMAIL ORDER BY M.MNO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}

SELECT M.MNO, M.MSNO, M.MNAME, M.MEMAIL, M.MPW, M.MGENDER, M.MPNO, M.MADDR, M.MLASTADDR, M.MPHONE, M.MPFILENAME, M.MPAYMENT, M.MPOINT, M.MGRADE, M.MREGDATE, R.ROLE FROM MEMBER M JOIN ROLE R ON M.MEMAIL = R.MEMAIL WHERE MNO = #{mNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MNO, MSNO, MNAME, MEMAIL, MPW, MGENDER, MPNO, MADDR, MLASTADDR, MPHONE, MPFILENAME, MPAYMENT, MPOINT, MGRADE, MREGDATE) VALUES(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mSno}, #{mName}, #{mEmail}, #{mPw}, #{mGender}, #{mPno}, #{mAddr}, #{mLastAddr}, #{mPhone}, #{mPFilename}, #{mPayment}, #{mPoint}, #{mGrade}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO ROLE (RNO, MEMAIL, ROLE) VALUES(ROLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mEmail}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MSNO = #{mSno}, MNAME = #{mName}, MEMAIL = #{mEmail}, MPW = #{mPw}, MGENDER = #{mGender}, MPNO = #{mPno}, MADDR = #{mAddr}, MLASTADDR = #{mLastAddr}, MPHONE = #{mPhone}, MPFILENAME = #{mPFilename}, MPAYMENT = #{mPayment}, MPOINT = #{mPoint}, MGRADE = #{mGrade} WHERE MNO = #{mNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER M JOIN ROLE R ON M.MEMAIL = R.MEMAIL WHERE ${column} like '%' || #{query} || '%'
